title: Frontend Developer
description: Job Description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building the client-side of our web applications.

title: Backend Developer
description: Job Description: We are seeking a Backend Developer to help us build scalable applications. You will work closely with the frontend team to integrate APIs.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Job Description: We are looking for a creative UI/UX Designer to help us enhance user experience across our platforms. You will be responsible for designing user interfaces.
